main event: A bright white object, possibly a star or a balloon, was observed circling slowly in the sky over Minot, North Dakota.
interesting points: The object flickered from white to red to blue during the observation.,It remained in the sky for about three hours.,The object was initially thought to be the star Vega due to its brightness and position.,The observation occurred on a clear night with no winds.,Multiple reports were received about the sighting, but no radar contacts could confirm the object's presence.
sighted object: a bright object flickering colors in the sky
witness description: Airman Huyge from 32FTR GRP at Minot AFB
